if(USE_PYTHON)
	if( EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libs" AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/boost" )
		if(USE_PYTHON EQUAL 2)
			find_package(PythonInterp 2.7 REQUIRED)
			find_package(PythonLibs 2.7 REQUIRED)
		else()
			find_package(PythonInterp 3.3 REQUIRED)
			find_package(PythonLibs 3.3 REQUIRED)
		endif()
		SET(Boost_LIBRARIES boost CACHE string "Boost library name")
		SET(Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CACHE string "Boost include directory")
		SET(USE_EXTERNAL_BOOST On CACHE bool "Use the boost library in externals")

		include_directories( ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIRS} )
		FILE(GLOB_RECURSE BOOST_PYTHON_FILES libs/python/src/*.cpp)
		add_library( boost ${BOOST_PYTHON_FILES} )
		target_link_libraries( boost ${PYTHON_LIBRARIES} )
	else()
		SET(USE_EXTERNAL_BOOST Off CACHE bool "Use the boost library in externals")
	endif()
endif()
